Headline: Yellow Line Delays
ShortDescription: Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier collision with a CTA vehicle entering Skokie Yard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier collision with a CTA vehicle entering Skokie Yard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 35th/California
ShortDescription: Westbound 35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, due to fire department activity near 35th/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #35 31st/35th buses are temporarily rerouted via 35th, California, due to fire department activity near 35th/California.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Forest Park. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem at Forest Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
